analysis.description:
AllAmericanCoin.startDate (/unique_chucks/36/0x99f4104611a904f50120e62da5f2e7981a1cf9fe.sol#109-110) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/36/0x99f4104611a904f50120e62da5f2e7981a1cf9fe.sol#218-230)
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/36/0x99f4104611a904f50120e62da5f2e7981a1cf9fe.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
